title: Vinogradov Trigonometric Sums and the Circle Method

blocks.name: df-vts
blocks.content: Define the Vinogradov trigonometric sums. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-vts(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cvts, cmpo(s0, s1, co(cc, cmap, cn), cn0, cmpt(s2, cc, csu(s3, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s3), cmul, cv(s2)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-vts(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ⊢ vts =(s0 ∈(ℂ[↦]ℕ), s1 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(s2 ∈ ℂ ↦ sum(s3 ∈(1[...]s1),((s0 ` s3)[×](exp `((i[×](2[×]π))[×](s3[×]s2)))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: vtsval
blocks.content: Value of the Vinogradov trigonometric sums (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm vtsval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(co(c0, cvts, c1), c2), csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c1), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, c2)))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, cn, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  fvmptd(hs0, co(c0, cvts, c1), c2, csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c1), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, c2))))), cc, csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c1), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs0)))))), universe, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, cvts, c1), cmpt(hs0, cc, csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c1), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs0)))))))), wcel(c0, co(cc, cmap, cn)), wcel(c1, cn0))
  sylibr(w0, wcel(c0, co(cc, cmap, cn)), wf(c0, cn, cc))
  elmap(c0, cc, cn)
  nnex()
  ovmpt2(hs1, hs2, c0, co(cc, cmap, cn), c1, cn0, cvts, cmpt(hs0, cc, csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c1), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs0))))))), cmpt(hs0, cc, csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs2)), co(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs0))))))), cmpt(hs0, cc, csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs2)), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs0))))))))
  mpteq2dv(hs0, cc, csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs2)), co(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs0)))))), csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs2)), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs0)))))), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  sumeq2sdv(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs2)), co(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs0))))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs0))))), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  oveq1d(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs0)))), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  fveq1(cv(hs1), c0, cv(s0))
  mpteq2dv(hs0, cc, csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs2)), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs0)))))), csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c1), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs0)))))), wceq(cv(hs2), c1))
  sumeq1d(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs2)), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs0))))), co(nat1, cfz, c1), wceq(cv(hs2), c1))
  oveq2(cv(hs2), c1, nat1, cfz)
  df-vts(hs1, hs2, hs0, s0)
  mptex(hs0, cc, csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c1), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs0)))))))
  cnex()
  adantl(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c1), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs0)))))), csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c1), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, c2)))))))
  sumeq2sdv(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c1), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs0))))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, c2)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  oveq2d(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs0)))), cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, c2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  fveq2d(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs0))), co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  oveq2d(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs0)), co(cv(s0), cmul, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0), cmul)
  a1i(w0, wcel(csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c1), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, c2))))), universe))
  sumex(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c1), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, c2)))))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c1), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, c2))))))
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(co(cc, cmap, cn))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cn0)
  diff.hs1.c(cmpt(hs0, cc, csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c1), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs0))))))))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(co(cc, cmap, cn))
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(cn0)
  diff.hs2.c(cmpt(hs0, cc, csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c1), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs0))))))))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat1, cfz, cv(hs2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(hs2), c1))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat1, cfz, c1)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: vtscl
blocks.content: Closure of the Vinogradov trigonometric sums (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 14-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm vtscl(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(co(c0, cvts, c1), c2), cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, cn, cc))
} = {
  eqeltrd(cfv(co(c0, cvts, c1), c2), cc, csu(hs0, co(nat1, cfz, c1), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cmul, c2))))), w0)
  vtsval(hs0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  fsumcl(hs0, co(nat1, cfz, c1), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cmul, c2)))), w0)
  fzfid(nat1, c1, w0)
  mulcld(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cmul, c2))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, c1))))
  ffvelrnd(c0, cv(hs0), cc, cn, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, c1))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, c1)), wf(c0, cn, cc))
  efcld(co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cmul, c2)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, c1))))
  mulcld(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cv(hs0), cmul, c2), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, c1))))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, c1))), wcel(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cc))
  mulcli(ci, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))
  ax-icn()
  mulcli(nat2, cpi)
  2cn()
  picn()
  mulcld(cv(hs0), c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, c1))))
  nncnd(cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, c1))))
  sselda(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, c1), cn, w0)
  a1i(w0, wss(co(nat1, cfz, c1), cn))
  fz1ssnn(c1)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, c1)), wcel(c2, cc))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat1, cfz, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: vtsprod
blocks.content: Express the Vinogradov trigonometric sums to the power of ` S ` (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 12-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm vtsprod(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, c0), cfv(co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cvts, c2), c3)), csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmul, c2)), csu(s2, co(co(nat1, cfz, c2), cfv(crepr, c0), cv(s1)), co(cprod(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, c0), cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s0)))), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cmul, c3))))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, co(nat0, cfzo, c0), co(cc, cmap, cn)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4d(cprod(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, c0), cfv(co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cvts, c2), c3)), csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmul, c2)), csu(s2, co(co(nat1, cfz, c2), cfv(crepr, c0), cv(s1)), co(cprod(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, c0), cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s0)))), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cmul, c3)))))), cprod(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, c0), csu(hs0, co(nat1, cfz, c2), co(cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), cmul, co(cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, c3)), cexp, cv(hs0))))), csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmul, c2)), csu(s2, co(co(nat1, cfz, c2), cfv(crepr, c0), cv(s1)), co(cprod(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, c0), cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s0)))), cmul, co(cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, c3)), cexp, cv(s1))))), w0)
  breprexp(s0, hs0, s1, s2, c0, c2, c1, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, c3)), w0)
  efcld(co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, c3), w0)
  prodeq2dv(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, c0), cfv(co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cvts, c2), c3), csu(hs0, co(nat1, cfz, c2), co(cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), cmul, co(cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, c3)), cexp, cv(hs0)))), w0)
  eqtrd(cfv(co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cvts, c2), c3), csu(hs0, co(nat1, cfz, c2), co(cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), cmul, co(cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, c3)), cexp, cv(hs0)))), csu(hs0, co(nat1, cfz, c2), co(cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cmul, c3))))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfzo, c0))))
  vtsval(hs0, cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfzo, c0))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfzo, c0)), wcel(c2, cn0))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfzo, c0))), wf(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cn, cc), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), co(cc, cmap, cn)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfzo, c0), c1, co(cc, cmap, cn), w0)
  elmapi(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cc, cn)
  sumeq2dv(hs0, co(nat1, cfz, c2), co(cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cmul, c3)))), co(cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), cmul, co(cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, c3)), cexp, cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfzo, c0))))
  oveq2d(cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cmul, c3))), co(cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, c3)), cexp, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfzo, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, c2))))
  eqtr3d(cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cmul, c3))), co(cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, c3)), cexp, cv(hs0)), cfv(ce, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, c3))), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfzo, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, c2))))
  fveq2d(ce, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, c3)), co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cmul, c3)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfzo, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, c2))))
  mul12d(cv(hs0), co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), c3, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfzo, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, c2))))
  zcnd(cv(hs0), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfzo, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, c2))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfzo, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, c2)), wcel(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cc))
  adantr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfzo, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, c2)), wcel(c3, cc))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfzo, c0)), wcel(c3, cc))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfzo, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, c2))), wceq(cfv(ce, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, c3))), co(cfv(ce, co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, c3)), cexp, cv(hs0))), wcel(co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, c3), cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cz))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfzo, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, c2)), wcel(co(co(ci, cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cmul, c3), cc))
  sseldi(cv(hs0), cz, co(nat1, cfz, c2), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfzo, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, c2))))
  fzssz(nat1, c2)

blocks.name: circlemeth
blocks.content: The Hardy, Littlewood and Ramanujan Circle Method, in a generic form, with different weighting / smoothing functions. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Dec-2021.)

blocks.name: circlemethnat
blocks.content: The Hardy, Littlewood and Ramanujan Circle Method, Chapter 5.1 of [Nathanson] p. 123. This expresses ` R ` , the number of different ways a nonnegative integer ` N ` can be represented as the sum of at most ` S ` integers in the set ` A ` as an integral of Vinogradov trigonometric sums. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Dec-2021.)
